title: Introduction to Generative AI
description: This introductory course explains what generative AI is, its uses, and how it differs from traditional machine learning methods. It covers Google Tools to help you develop your own generative AI applications.

title: Google AI Essentials
description: This self-paced course is designed to help people across roles and industries get essential AI skills to boost their productivity. It includes practical, hands-on experience with AI tools.

title: Introduction to Generative AI
description: This microlearning course aims to explain what generative AI is and how it is used. It also covers Google tools to help you develop your own generative AI applications.

title: Developing Applications with Google Cloud: Foundations
description: This course covers the fundamentals of application development on Google Cloud, including best practices for cloud applications and an introduction to generative AI.
